City Council
============

* 2nd and 4th Thursdays of each month
* Stanwood-Camano School District Administration Building
  26920 Pioneer Highway, Stanwood

* Stanwood-Camano School District Administration Building
  26920 Pioneer Highway, Stanwood



![Full Council 2026](https://stanwoodwa.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=9175)

*Darren Robb, Sid Roberts, Robert Hicks, Steve Shepro,
Andreena Bergman, Jeff Wheatley, Dani Gaumond, Earl Cowan*

All regular and special meetings of the Stanwood City Council are open to the public, except as provided for in
[Revised Code of Washington (RCW) 42.30](http://apps.leg.wa.gov/RCW/default.aspx?cite=42.30&full=true)
. Council meetings are run in accordance with Council’s
[Rules of
Procedure
.](https://stanwoodwa.org/DocumentCenter/View/7627/Rules-of-Procedure-FINAL-Feb-22-2024)

Anyone wishing to provide a written comment must submit it by 12:00 p.m. the day of the meeting by clicking this link
or by email
[**city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us**](mailto:city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us)

Anyone wishing to provide a verbal comment may do so by attending the city council meeting in person.

City of Stanwood council meetings can receive remote (online or phone-in) public comments by reasonable accommodation only.  Any requests for reasonable accommodations for remote participation, must be sent in writing to the City Clerk at
[**city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us**](mailto:cityclerk@stanwood.wa.us)
no later than 12:00 p.m. on the day of the meeting.

Anyone wishing to provide a written testimony for a public hearing must submit it by 12:00 p.m. the day of the meeting by calling (360) 454-5213 or by clicking this link

City of Stanwood public hearings can receive remote (online or phone-in) testimony by reasonable accommodation only.  Any requests for reasonable accommodations for remote participation, must be sent in writing to the City Clerk at
[**city.clerk@ci.stanwood.wa.us**](mailto:cityclerk@stanwood.wa.us)
no later than 12:00 p.m. on the day of the meeting.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://stanwoodwa.portal.civicclerk.com/)
